casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Derek Scott McQUEEN. No. 101P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 5, 2007. Patricia A. Duffy, Assistant Attorney General, Peter S. Gilchrist, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 639 S.E.2d 131.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of April 2007 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of April 2007."
